Articles.Content:
I want to do a career mode with fully upgraded facilities at start, but I don't know how much it cost to make them all modern ksc. I want to do science mode, but with contracts, and 0 money to start out with

Edited February 3, 2015 by jake9039

I believe the upgrading cost is tied to the contract failure punishment slider (the monetary one) so if you set that to 0% you should be able to upgrade them for free (and get out of bad contracts for free).

Or just double-cheat and tell us what the answer is - give yourself loads of money, upgrade the buildings then put the money back to zero.

Apart from getting rid of the building-upgrade cost though I'm not sure how this is different to 'plain' career mode, since you'll still have to pay for each vehicle you launch.
Going by the upgrade costs on the wiki, 9.8 million funds * your monetary penalty percent
